definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all

sentences.english: I see India from Lumbini Nepal to Sonauli India, thank you!
sentences.chinese: 我想從尼泊爾加德滿都陸路去印度新德里，有班車嗎？

sentences.english: This family of 12 decided to move to Kathmandu.
sentences.chinese: 準備搬遷到加德滿都的12口之家。

sentences.english: Now in Nepal, this is in Katmandu, This is a market area on the street.
sentences.chinese: 現在是尼泊爾，這是加德滿都，街道上有個十集市。

sentences.english: The pavilion will put on display the luster of Katmandu, the capital city of Nepal and an architectural, artistic and cultural center that has developed over 2,000 years.
sentences.chinese: 尼泊爾首都加德滿都是一座“寺廟之城”。
